definition: to cut the feet to fit the shoes (idiom); to force sth to fit (as to a Procrustean bed)/impractical or inelegant solution
to peel with a knife/to pare/to cut (a ball at tennis etc)
to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue

sentences.english: We mustn't cut the feet to fit the shoes.
Doing this is cutting the foot to fit the shoe.
sentences.chinese: 這樣做無異於削足適履。
